fullDescription.intro: This node adds a Keras Zero-Padding 2D Layer to an existing deep learning network.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: A tuple of two integers. How many zeros to add at the beginning and at the end of the first spatial dimension.
A tuple of two integers. How many zeros to add at the beginning and at the end of the second spatial dimension.
